docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Nov. 13 After 17 years of looking after the world's millions of homeless refugees, Prince Sadruddin Aga Khan is giving up his influential and prestigious position as High Commissioner for Refugees.

docs.snippet: Jefferson Patterson, a career diplomat who came out of retirement to serve as Ambassador to Uruguay from 1956 to 1958, died Saturday in Georgetown University Hospital in Washington. He was 86 years old and lived in Washington.
